bibl.title: Some Curious Prescripts (Native Languages in Greek Dress?). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Suggests that the letter-prescript §g≈ + name in nominative + grãfv + name in dative goes back to the Coptic. Brief examination of a few further cases of possible bilingual interference. <ego, grapho>
GONIS Nikolaos, Some Curious Prescripts (Native Languages in Greek Dress?). Avec résumé en anglais.
